title: The Hot Pot Party of Our Dreams!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>A few days ago, Kana-chan and I went shopping at the supermarket she works at, and I learned that there are so many kinds of hot pot soups!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oh, really? We don’t really use store-bought soups for our hot pot back home~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, right, you live in a ryokan, right, Chikacchi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah. Our food tastes sooo good~. But it’d be nice to try a different kind of hot pot for a change of pace!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Then why don’t we have a hot pot party at Ai-san’s place?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Let’s do it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Let’s choose what kind of soup we want and figure out what ingredients we’ll need...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>We can put in as many ingredients as we want~! I want to put mochi in!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh! We can get tsukune with mochi in it now, you know? It’s really good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>We’ll definitely be putting that in~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
